channel.title: Bbl
channel.description: BBL (Boat Bytecode Library) is now almost finished to my satisfaction. I've decided to give it out for others to enjoy and hopefully learn a bit from. If you look through it, I'm sure you'll easily find little bugs and things I didn't get around to finishing. I modified it a lot for public release and haven't tested it; maybe it's totally broken. I don't know, and frankly, I don't care. I'd love to help with any bugs you might encounter though, because I'm using this too. All I ask is that there are no "how do I use this?" posts, so I'm not driven to the brink of flaming. So, better phrased, don't make me regret this post.

item.title: Bbl
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:11, topic:146248”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=200234.msg1779448#msg1779448 date=1190709044]

maybe you should post what it is and what it does for the noobs & me
[/quote]Noobs like you are not allowed to know what it is. Also, stop spamming the reports with useless crap.

. ie: reporting a post of “Boat.” on a closed thread. I found that “Boat.” was as on-topic to the thread as the last 3 pages of it, so it fits perfectly with the direction.[/quote]
so its ok if other people do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Bbl
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:11, topic:146248”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=200234.msg1779448#msg1779448 date=1190709044]

maybe you should post what it is and what it does for the noobs & me
[/quote]Noobs like you are not allowed to know what it is. Also, stop spamming the reports with useless crap.

So true. Over 3000 posts of useless garbage. I can only imagine the reporting that’s been done. ie: reporting a post of “Boat.” on a closed thread. I found that “Boat.” was as on-topic to the thread as the last 3 pages of it, so it fits perfectly with the direction. Please find a hobby besides going through EVERY single post on the forum and find some way to reply to it, no matter how irrelevant it may be. Or at least try to post something someone may not see as a total waste of time.[/quote]

Boat.

Read full topic

I found that “Boat.” was as on-topic to the thread as the last 3 pages of it, so it fits perfectly with the direction. Please find a hobby besides going through EVERY single post on the forum and find some way to reply to it, no matter how irrelevant it may be. Or at least try to post something someone may not see as a total waste of time.

It’s a bytecode library primarily targeted at those wanting to make a RS2 bot. Had I taken the time, it would’ve been a source of inspirational quotes too.
[/quote] its not like there aren’t millions of those quotes. have you made a bot with it?
/ignoring pwnd[/quote]
Idea for what pwnd will do /warning bobby lol good job silver

item.title: Bbl

item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

BBL (Boat Bytecode Library) is now almost finished to my satisfaction. I’ve decided to give it out for others to enjoy and hopefully learn a bit from. If you look through it, I’m sure you’ll easily find little bugs and things I didn’t get around to finishing. I modified it a lot for public release and haven’t tested it; maybe it’s totally broken. I don’t know, and frankly, I don’t care. I’d love to help with any bugs you might encounter though, because I’m using this too. All I ask is that there are no “how do I use this?” posts, so I’m not driven to the brink of flaming. So, better phrased, don’t make me regret this post.
